title: rowlet-owl changed my life
content:
Rowlet-Owl changed my life. He encouraged me to embrace my true self—my real identity, my pronouns, and my true sense of being. I am Rowlet-Owl-sexual. I will share this with my parents during dinner, hoping they don’t try to set me up with someone else. To represent the Rowlet-Owl community, I plan to wear a cardboard Rowlet-Owl costume and intentionally move in slow motion at half a meter per hour during a 10 km marathon to showcase the steady, deliberate grace of my muse.

Thank you, Rowlet-Owl, for helping me cast away the false sense of normalcy society gave me and guiding me to embrace the real me, even if that real me lives in delusion. Thank you for always showing me a perspective that reminds me there’s beauty in life’s quirks and imperfections. Long live Rowlet-Owl. Be proud, Rowlet-Owl-sexuals, and embrace who you truly are!

comments.body: Didn't know these days pokemons capture their trainers 💀
another copy pasta has hit the tower😭🙏
we got rowlet fan fiction before gta 6
What has this subReddit turned into :/
That man must be removed from mods
Gotta clap em all gotta clap em all pokemon
Post so diabolical that rowlet-owl himself ignored it
all jbls morons are using this sub these days.
Rowlett-owl sexual is now the 69th gender cuz of you 😭😭
This is unfortunately the first thing I see after a 10 hour flight
it is important to cleanse your eyes with pure literature like this after long flights
Donald Trump wants to know your location
